com.layers.app.data

Class ActivityDataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.layers.app.data.ActivityDataService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActivityDataInterface

    public class ActivityDataService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActivityDataInterface

    Data Access Object that retrieves data requested from the ActivityBusinessService. Most queries are dependent to the location the data is relevent to.

    All querys are performed in a prepared statement to protect the arguments from SQL injection. Prepared Statement queries and result sets may be assembled and parsed, respectively, using a helper function from the class this DAO is relevent to.

    See Also:
    Activity, ActivityBusinessService
